title: Suspended again (With ingamelog)
body:
Chermorg decided to lock down this thread and lie about the reason.
The same moderator have been caught lying several times and even admitting that him nor riot will never change their mind. (like when he made the claim that I had violated every moderator, this was disproven by his college!)
Chermorg also was being called on discord as I wanted to talk to him. He declined the call and said "Im not going to have a screaming match with you" <-- Judgement based on nothing. I have not screamed at anyone for over 10 years.

I have asked of him to stop putting words in my mouth and to stop passing judgement and lies. This has not stopped.
This moderator is abusing his powers, and by me not showing submission he will continue to act like this...
I have pointed it out and I have the logs and evidence for this, so does riot.

Dont allow his lies to cloud your judgement!

Again suspended... 10 game chat restriciton... what did I do?
The log is 100% copied from the client , nothing has been added nor removed nor edited.
What is the problem in these logs?
Game 1
King of the Poro: gl hf, buff the IQ of all children
King of the Poro: maokai just called me an "idiot" ... I bet you my 100.000 euro apartment he cant define "idiot", any takers?
King of the Poro: This also highly motivates me to play well for this team
King of the Poro: thank you
King of the Poro: dont have one
King of the Poro: why not just be nice to your team? and they can help you
King of the Poro: and I have about 40 friends.
King of the Poro: namecalling.. nice.. Now Im "trashcan
King of the Poro: and muted! wow...
King of the Poro: im not afk, wtf? reportcalling is not allowed according to summoners code
King of the Poro: you knwo what to do with this toxic player.
King of the Poro: Im defendign
King of the Poro: Infront of my keyboard.. or behind.. dependeing on where you are looking from
King of the Poro: report calling is not allowed by summoners code, you know what to do with these toxic players!
King of the Poro: Why do kids act this way? calling teammates "idiots" and then start to harass them like this?
King of the Poro: and why is noone standing up for the one getting bullied?
King of the Poro: you see that? That is the attitude of children 2017
King of the Poro: again , reportcalling
King of the Poro: again namecalling
King of the Poro: second game ruined by children
King of the Poro: "No bitch it was your atttiude" ... I didnt call him idiot...
King of the Poro: "yeah panth ur low kid get a life" .. Im 30+ years old
King of the Poro: "son of a butch" /vlad
King of the Poro: bi...
King of the Poro: see this attitude? what can I do about it?
King of the Poro: how can I make it stop?
King of the Poro: is that the 5th time they break summoners code just to report call? wow...
King of the Poro: This is what Im trying to tell them, they wont listen. sory
King of the Poro: okey, sorry... but not really
King of the Poro: and you just broke summoners code
King of the Poro: okey allow me to look it up If you lie, can I say you did lie?
King of the Poro: and you have read it thresh?
King of the Poro: ok vlad
King of the Poro: "They are never happy and wants more and more" .. more and more what? and Im rather happy today...
King of the Poro: another report-call... wow
King of the Poro: is that 7th?
King of the Poro: vlad, where do you live so I can ocme and perform that service?
King of the Poro: maokai, you did lie.. you said you were gong to mute me, why lie bro?
King of the Poro: gj enemy team
King of the Poro: thresh where did you come up with that stuff? Becuase what you said is not whats on there
King of the Poro: they are,
King of the Poro: thansk for asking
King of the Poro: why so mad pro?
King of the Poro: yes, mad
King of the Poro: means angry
King of the Poro: hahahaha
King of the Poro: maokai, why are you so angry, and why do you lie? I dont get it
King of the Poro: talk to me.
King of the Poro: not true
King of the Poro: threhs, talk to me
King of the Poro: not true and htat is not what the page urban dictinoary said
King of the Poro: another report call? wow its like I can predict the future!
King of the Poro: did you notice that my team and some players from enemy team chose to be nasty, noone have tried to be friendly, strange huh?
King of the Poro: very toxic behavior from ranom lolplayers
King of the Poro: to not help out, but calling temmates "idiots" etc
King of the Poro: maokai did lie before, he made the clame he was going to mute me...
King of the Poro: but I who never lie is the problem and the toxic person
King of the Poro: not the person calling teammates" idiot" and "suck my dick" ... those are not the problems, never was
King of the Poro: my mum does viktor
King of the Poro: "noone cares about you" /viktor... my mum does, 
King of the Poro: Checkmate
King of the Poro: gg wp
Game 2
King of the Poro: gl hf
King of the Poro: Im the worlds most toxic player.
King of the Poro: You lie, I dont... Why you lie? Riot told me Im the worlds most toxic player, riot never told you anything
King of the Poro: Im perm banned
King of the Poro: 14..
King of the Poro: while he did type that he lost 3 cs...
King of the Poro: slow :/
King of the Poro: jax play safe please
King of the Poro: you are stronger late
King of the Poro: kata, I did bait them in cause they had wards
King of the Poro: kha come
King of the Poro: Im older then all of you and have better refexes, wtf?
King of the Poro: free drake
King of the Poro: ez :/
King of the Poro: ez, you go balls deep for no reason without wards... I have 0 escape
King of the Poro: and I have to follow you or you die 20 times
King of the Poro: you are adc Im support?
King of the Poro: that is not the problem ez
King of the Poro: the problem is you overextend without wards
King of the Poro: herald?
King of the Poro: ofc, but again... you overextended without wards.
King of the Poro: why does me "towerdiving" or "ganking" or "feeding" or whatever have to do with you overextrending?
King of the Poro: I know its nothing.. yet people keep reflecting.
King of the Poro: I was oom :(
King of the Poro: why am I fighting 3 players while you farm cs? :(
King of the Poro: ahh , they were duo
King of the Poro: ez, you have range and they have cooldowns, you can poke them
King of the Poro: I will only protect kata from now on. Im done trying to protect all of you
King of the Poro: I didnt see teemo, did you?
King of the Poro: I cant protect you there kata
King of the Poro: you guys are throwing hard
King of the Poro: only def
King of the Poro: do not engage
King of the Poro: kata, I shielded you, what more can I do?
King of the Poro: kata, jax is just mad cause he lost a 2v1 with kha.. and stop acting up
King of the Poro: Im gold
King of the Poro: khazix??? we were 2v1
King of the Poro: for what?
King of the Poro: understand that my ult is not global
King of the Poro: jax wants to report me because my ultimate is not global? ... and Im the worlds most toxic lol player
King of the Poro: "ok pro" .. never claimed I was pro...
King of the Poro: Why does people act like this? why cant we be nice and talk?
King of the Poro: thanks jax for what?
King of the Poro: and can I contact you?
King of the Poro: lol


In the first game, 3 people from Poland are in my team and they are all friends. I am pantheon and have the snowball (as its an aram game) I manage to land my snowball on enemy ez and active it. I jump him and start to deal dmg... I notice how his team is swarming me and I flash out and start to run... my team doesnt really help me and as soon as I die I get called "idiot" , twice. You see my response to this attack in the log.

I also got told that I was getting muted ( that was a lie as he continued to talk to me throughout the game and namecalling)
I got suspended, they didnt... I invite riot to post the entire log of that game... but they wont because provokation is not part of the game(?).... Also, I did call it, strange huh that I can predict my own punishments.

replies.body:
As the OP has shown no indication of discontinuing the behavior that got them punished in the game towards others, this thread is being locked. It is not permissible (in game, nor on the boards) to antagonize others, make thinly veiled insults towards others that are under the guise of “questions” or “the truth”, nor to openly insult others and make baseless accusations that are at best merely off topic for this discussion.

OP - this is not the first time you have had this behavior, and in fact you have posted multiple times on the boards regarding your prior punishments. I **strongly** recommend you take a step back, read the comments that others have taken the time to write to you as to why you were punished here, and take it to heart. There is no “defending yourself” excuse, no matter how much you think there should be one - it doesn’t exist, and if you fail to understand that you will continue to be punished up to and including permanent bans as you’ve had before.

If anyone has any questions about this action please feel free to visit us in the [Boards Moderation Discord server](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification), or if unable to access that, on the [Discuss the Boards sub-board](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation).
Nearly everything you said was antagonizing other players, that's why you got punished. Please just mute them and play the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:15:45.894+0000)
>
> Nearly everything you said was antagonizing other players, that's why you got punished. Please just mute them and play the game.

And everything that was said to me during that game was attacks. I was namecalled and questioned all game... all I did was defend myself.
So why do you lie Deep Terror Nami?
Why cant you understand how a person reacts when being called idiots and other names? In this case the reform card claims I didnt keep my cool... while the log really shows I did. I didnt attack them and I pointed out when they broke summoners code.

Remember that I came to you on discord and did try to talk to you about this? How can I express myself in order to avoid getting attacked...
If you were to realease the logs of that game it will show that before I have said anything (really) I was called an idiot twice.
That is a provokation, a provokation that is not allowed in real life, but on the rift it is?

So please nami, why are you lying about my logs?

First of all, you need to stop baselessly accusing others of lying. Nami offered an objective analysis of your logs and why you were punished for them.

You are judged on your behavior and yours alone. It does not matter what others say, as you are free to (and expected to) mute others if they are abusing you. Other players behavior does not give you a free pass to return with violations of the Summoner's Code.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:25:02.166+0000)
>
> First of all, you need to stop baselessly accusing others of lying. Nami offered an objective analysis of your logs and why you were punished for them.
> 
> You are judged on your behavior and yours alone. It does not matter what others say, as you are free to (and expected to) mute others if they are abusing you. Other players behavior does not give you a free pass to return with violations of the Summoner's Code.

Also.
You are not fit to judge what is ontopic and what is not... as of now you are in fact offtopic, just like you been in all my threads... I report these comments and nothing happens... and this is why you are not fit to judge what is ontopic and what is not.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:25:02.166+0000)
>
> First of all, you need to stop baselessly accusing others of lying. Nami offered an objective analysis of your logs and why you were punished for them.
> 
> You are judged on your behavior and yours alone. It does not matter what others say, as you are free to (and expected to) mute others if they are abusing you. Other players behavior does not give you a free pass to return with violations of the Summoner's Code.

No I wont, becuase if you lie to me I will point it out and save the evidence for this.
Nami did lie, more then once to me.
He/she also stated that we were supposed to talk about Tantrams lies about me "lets do that another time" and he/she never got back to me = LIE!

SO plesae Chermorg, the person with a mind that can not be changed nor improved at all (your own words)... dont tell me how to think or how to act. I lack respect for you as you have shown me none.
You have also been caught passing judgement and lies when you claimed you didnt want to talk to me becuase it was going to be a "screaming match" ... what you didnt understand is that I cant really scream at anyone and I have not yelled at anyone for several years.

You pass judgement and you have your mind set... You tell me how to act around poeople rocking these personalities?

Im not being judged by my behavior alone... that is even more b.s

If I was, then why am I punished and not the 3 people from PL who constantly namecalled med and lied during the entire game.
I didnt call them idiots, they did call me one.

It doesn't matter who started it smart one. you both flamed, you both reported.


You just happened to be reported consistently enough you got punished for it.


He's not lying, you're just delusional. 


When 2 students get in a fight at a highschool, it doesn't matter who started it, they both get suspended.

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:27:02.981+0000)
>
> It doesn't matter who started it smart one. you both flamed, you both reported.
> 
> 
> You just happened to be reported consistently enough you got punished for it.
> 
> 
> He's not lying, you're just delusional. 
> 
> 
> When 2 students get in a fight at a highschool, it doesn't matter who started it, they both get suspended.

Sorry no.
I didnt flame once.

Sorry but now you lie as you have no clue how many games I have played... go watch my match history before you speak.
You just got caught lying mate.

And how well are Murrican schools doing these days? ohh yeah, you dropped the results required to get decent score in order for student to feel better... how did that go and whos at the top of the SATs?
You type waaaaaay too much. In itself that is not punishable, but 99% of what you said was just arguing with your team. Just mute them and ignore them.

> [{quoted}](name=RallerenP,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:16:02.199+0000)
>
> You type waaaaaay too much. In itself that is not punishable, but 99% of what you said was just arguing with your team. Just mute them and ignore them.

No, there are no too much and too little. Where are you coming up with this from?

The fact that you have not understood that I was attacked and defending myself and you missunderstand this as argumetns... wtf? Why would you missunderstand it to that point just to attack me with a lie and judgement? Becuase its your opinion that I talk to much, another opinion is that I dont talk enough.
Its true, tis not punishable and why should it, why even bring it up?
I could sit here and say "You all think waaaay too little!" <-- this is my opinion and its useless as it lacks facts and reasoning.

Sorry I dont really believe in mute and you did miss the part where my team said they were going to mute me, they didnt, they did lie.

> [{quoted}](name=Rhasta Smokeleaf,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:23:30.670+0000)
>
> No, there are no too much and too little. Where are you coming up with this from?
> 
> The fact that you have not understood that I was attacked and defending myself and you missunderstand this as argumetns... wtf? Why would you missunderstand it to that point just to attack me with a lie and judgement? Becuase its your opinion that I talk to much, another opinion is that I dont talk enough.
> Its true, tis not punishable and why should it, why even bring it up?
> I could sit here and say "You all think waaaay too little!" <-- this is my opinion and its useless as it lacks facts and reasoning.
> 
> Sorry I dont really believe in mute and you did miss the part where my team said they were going to mute me, they didnt, they did lie.

You either need to not react or to mute them, those are your choices.

> [{quoted}](name=EvilDustMan,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:27:49.227+0000)
>
> You either need to not react or to mute them, those are your choices.

No sorry, I like my choice better as it has been proven to prevent bullying and abusive behavior while "Muting and not reacting" is proven to cause more pain and suffering.

Also note that the person I wrote that too were unable to answer the questions, again: Strange huh?

> [{quoted}](name=Rhasta Smokeleaf,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:39:19.044+0000)
>
> No sorry, I like my choice better 

Then you will keep getting restricted.

> [{quoted}](name=EvilDustMan,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:41:53.591+0000)
>
> Then you will keep getting restricted.

I know, and I keep posting the logs here for everyone to see how messed up RIOTs systems are.
Its a great relationship of customer vs product. <-- Something I did study and everyone else in here didnt.

> [{quoted}](name=Rhasta Smokeleaf,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:10:37.973+0000)
> King of the Poro: ... I bet you my 100.000 euro apartment he cant define "idiot"
> King of the Poro: Why do kids act this way? 
> King of the Poro: you see that? That is the attitude of children 2017
> King of the Poro: second game ruined by children
> King of the Poro: Im older then all of you and have better refexes, wtf?
> King of the Poro: I will only protect kata from now on. Im done trying to protect all of you
> King of the Poro: Why does people act like this? why cant we be nice and talk?

In addition to constantly complaining about what your team is doing and CONSTANTLY asking for reports (to the point where it becomes harassment), you're also extremely condescending to your teammates in the quotes above. That's not acceptable behavior.

> [{quoted}](name=The Djinn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:22:28.168+0000)
>
> In addition to constantly complaining about what your team is doing and CONSTANTLY asking for reports (to the point where it becomes harassment), you're also extremely condescending to your teammates in the quotes above. That's not acceptable behavior.

No that is not at all what I was doing.
The Djinn, the man who did lie to me previously... I dont put words in your mouth and I ask you now nice to not do that to me.
Okey then lets go over it since you laim I constantly complaining about what my team is doing...
"King of the Poro: ... I bet you my 100.000 euro apartment he cant define "idiot"" <-- This is me questionging the use of a word from another summoner, a summoner just like yourself who decided to lie to me and said he had muted me, he had not , that was a lie. Its also not complaining... its a bet. You make bet in order to win money often based on your own knowledge or skill.

"King of the Poro: Why do kids act this way?" <-- Open quesiton, not complaning
? <--- indicates a quesiton, not complaning.

"King of the Poro: you see that? That is the attitude of children 2017" <-- Pointing out such behavior, again not complaning

I can go on and on, but you wont address it anyways.

Putting your insults and abuse under the veil of questions doesn't make it okay. Calling people children is the problem there, not that you were asking a question.

This is your last warning. Stop calling people liars and antagonizing people here in this thread or it will be locked.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:36:19.620+0000)
>
> Putting your insults and abuse under the veil of questions doesn't make it okay. Calling people children is the problem there, not that you were asking a question.
> 
> This is your last warning. Stop calling people liars and antagonizing people here in this thread or it will be locked.

I have no idea what you are talking about "Putting your insults and abuse under the veil of questions doesn't make it okay" 
I have not put anything under anything to my understanding.... well one sentence under the other, but is that really a problem?
Im not murrican, you cant use advance level English when typing to me.. you cant use slang terms like "raining cats and dogs" becuase I most certainly wont get it.

No sorry I dont take lightly on warnings.
WHen you stop lying I will stop pointing it out.

You also did lie when you made the claim that I hade violated every moderator...I asked Terror nami about this and he/she made it clear that he/she did not feel violated nor had these thoughts.. yet you made this claim that.
"Charmorg - 10/03/2017
Every single moderator thinks you violated them."

Dont tell me what to do, you are not my father. nor my mum nor anyone I share common respect with.
Still noone able to stay on topic... not even moderators... NOONE is able to tell me what within that log is the problem. VERY STRANGE!

You clearly are clueless in your actions and YOURS ALONE. Get over yourself, shut up and play. Got better reflexes? use them in game PLAYING not typing like a nob. Want to complain to people? Go write a twitterlong or some shit.

> [{quoted}](name=SparklingLama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:33:07.335+0000)
>
> You clearly are clueless in your actions and YOURS ALONE. Get over yourself, shut up and play. Got better reflexes? use them in game PLAYING not typing like a nob. Want to complain to people? Go write a twitterlong or some shit.

Okey, what actions are you talking about?
No sorry I wont shut up, because who are you to tell me to shut up?
Why dont you grow some intellect and a personality and then approch me with some substance that we can actually discuss?`
As of now, you attack me for things that you dont know and again: Just like my opinion, your opnion is useless.

nob? The door nob or misspelled "n00b" ?

I dont want to complain, but you are really offtopic, no worries, moderators here are not fit to judge what is offtopic anyways.

I'm gonna give you the biggest tip you'll ever get in this game, /mute all, there is no reason for you not to, even at challenger levels the players only speak in discord or real life, they don't even bother to type in chat.

> [{quoted}](name=Tactrix,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:32:08.773+0000)
>
> I'm gonna give you the biggest tip you'll ever get in this game, /mute all, there is no reason for you not to, even at challenger levels the players only speak in discord or real life, they don't even bother to type in chat.

Been there, done that...
Guess what happen?
I got 3 friendrequests after that game... and 20 min of 3 people telling me how much we would have won if I had not muted them all.

Sorry, there is no winning here.

My God, do you ever shut up during games?  If you added up every game I've played this year it doesn't equal your chat log from TWO games.  

Why not just stop talking and play the game?  I'd report you, too.  There's nothing worse than playing with someone that is more concerned with their edgy chat over their own game.  

Sure, you're not the most toxic person, but your chat log certainly leads me to conclude that you would be annoying to play with at the very least.  Maybe your chat restriction will teach you a valuable lesson... shut up.

> [{quoted}](name=Scary Door,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TzIyRU1V,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-20T13:16:22.026+0000)
>
> My God, do you ever shut up during games?  If you added up every game I've played this year it doesn't equal your chat log from TWO games.  
> 
> Why not just stop talking and play the game?  I'd report you, too.  There's nothing worse than playing with someone that is more concerned with their edgy chat over their own game.  
> 
> Sure, you're not the most toxic person, but your chat log certainly leads me to conclude that you would be annoying to play with at the very least.  Maybe your chat restriction will teach you a valuable lesson... shut up.

No and why would I allow children to do my talking for me?
Your god, do you ever think before you type or is it the first thing that comes to mind you have to write?

If you cant multitask and type and play at the same time, then why would you want to restrict me? I think you are jealous of me being able to multitask, play and talk at the same time... and do it at a fiarly decent level and winning games... So why are you jealous of my ability to multitask and why are you so lazy you dont work on your own ability to multitask?

Sure you report me too, and this is what I have made threads about... you have pride and you feel shame. WHenever questioning your pride or shame you report them, no matter if its true or not. Its as if you call me something bad, lets say "Twister" , and I call you "humm"... then you report me to the police for saying "humm" and leave our you did call me twister. Im not allowing you to restrict my life and Im not restricting your life, so wtf mate? Why are you holding me to different standards as you do yourself?

I am the most toxic person i nthe world.

Ofc I am annoying to anyone who cant argue with me... that is common sense that anyone dumb arguing with anyone smart gets annoyed that he cant comprehend and lack the knowledge... very understandable and logical and resonable.

Sorry, I wont shut up and I wont listen to you becuase just like my opinion... your opinion is useless.
